item.description:
Members,

Our next meet is on January 17th, Sunday, 1 pm to 5 pm, at the Holliston Meadows, 140 Summer Street, Holliston, MA 01746 (508) 429 1500.

Check out the photos that Joan (owner of Jack andd Petie) took, posted on our sister site, Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup. Both groups were in attendance.

Our permanent site, for meetups combining both groups, will be at Holliston Meadows. The whole building is gorgeous and very clean. We never even smell any dog smells!!! The meetup site is cozy, clean, beautiful and personal, with windows and a treadmill. There is an outside space fenced in where dogs can potty, connected to our meetup room.

Please tell other small dog owners you know. All small dog breeds or mixed breed are invited as long as they get along with other small dogs.

Flower Kausel has offered to help me organize the meets. She and her husband Scott are the owners of a beautiful Havanese named Jose.

Happiest of Holidays!

Kim
(508) 561 6881
laptopmaltese@aol.com

Please RSVP and let me know what food or beverage you are bringing.

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Mass. Small Breed Dog Meetup, Jan. 17th, SUNDAY, 1 pm-5pm Holliston Meadows
